head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SEGAL, HATTIE CLARK

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SEGAL, HATTIE CLARK

block.p: SEGAL-Hattie Clark. On Sunday, September 4 in Jerusalem at 90. Wife of the late Rabbi Bernard Segal, mother of Gita Rotenberg and David Segal. Grandmother of Avital, Meir, Noam Rotenberg, Dahna Stadtmauer, Devorah, Miryam, and Eliyahu Segal and six great grandchildren. Sister of Frieda Hyman, Martha Silber, and Esther Koppel. Shiva is at Shimoni 4/22, Jerusalem, Israel and 33-05 90th Street, Jackson Heights.
